Rewards Rate: For Online Spends of Rs. 200, You Get 8 Reward Points and for Offline Spends you Would Get 4 RPs. Also, Earn 2 Reward Points on Select Categories
Reward Redemption: The reward points can be redeemed against a variety of products and vouchers available on the website.

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Waiver of joining and renewal fee on the basis of the amount spent using the credit card.
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge is waived off across all fuel stations in India.

product_details: For every ₹200 spent on online purchases, you will get 8 Reward Points.
4 Reward Points on every ₹200 spent offline.
2 Reward Points per ₹200 spent on select categories like rent, insurance, etc.
Spend-based waiver of joining and renewal fee.
You can avail of great offers on dining, shopping, travel, wellness, etc.
